title: Black Bottom Murder
description: *This is book 6 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   When Missy attends an East Texas cupcake convention, she is nearly overwhelmed by the competition. Her inspiration leads her to launch a new cupcake design, but the first bite poisons one of her customers! Now Detective Beckett and Missy must overcome their differences and solve the murder before another cupcake catastrophe.  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1zyu5vx Book 2: http://amzn.to/1F4EZvi Book 3: http://amzn.to/1Eq21qR Book 4: http://amzn.to/1L0JO7m Book 5: http://amzn.to/1BlRwDY   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Carol Durand
